doc:
Eric Barker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Barker 0 Eric Leslie Barker (12 February 1912 – 1 June 1990) was an English comedy actor. He is most remembered for his roles in the popular British Carry On films, although he only appeared in the early films in the series, apart from returning for Carry On Emmannuelle in 1978. Eric_Leslie_Barker ( 12_February_1912 – 1_June_1990 ) was an_English_comedy_actor . He is most_remembered for his_roles in the_popular_British_Carry On films , although he only appeared in the_early_films in the_series , apart from returning for Carry On Emmannuelle in 1978 .
